name: Project Foxblade Combat Demo v0.2
description:
This is a small combat demo meant to provide an early look at the combat mechanics of Project Foxblade.
Project Foxblade is an in-development action RPG themed after PSX/Saturn RPGs and inspired by late 90s anime. The game aims to provide a classic JRPG feel but with a modern fast-paced and action oriented combat system.

In this demo, you'll be pitted against unending waves of opponents called Globs, against which you can try out the mechanics of movement, combat, and spellcasting. Try it out and see how many Globs you can kill!

CREDITS
These talented people were crucial to nailing the look and sound of this demo!
Music - Shimshon (https://twitter.com/Shimshon_of_Gad/)
Background art - Pixelkeep (https://twitter.com/pixel_keep)
Character sprites - Justen Moore (http://luneder.artstation.com/)
Voice of Leigh - Krystal Hall (https://twitter.com/CrystalMushroom)
